definition: the thousands place (or column) in the decimal system
see 鞦韆|秋千[qiu1 qian1]
thousand
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
kilobit

sentences.english: A wide range of data transfer rates are available, with speeds up to about 128 kilobits per second.
sentences.chinese: 提供较宽的数据传输速率，速率可达每秒128千位。

sentences.english: A wide range of data transfer rates are available, with speeds up to about 128 kilobits per second (kBps).
sentences.chinese: 提供较宽的数据传输速率，速率可达每秒128千位。

sentences.english: He claims to have collected thousands of signatures.
sentences.chinese: 他也宣称他有上千位反对者的签名。

sentences.english: Indicates whether thousands separator will be inserted between every three decimal digits.
sentences.chinese: 表示每三位数是否应加入千位分隔符号。

the units place (or column) in the decimal system

direct election
many schools of thought/many people or households
esteemed guest/honored guest/guest (on a show)
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
